Kim woke up to a loud knocking on her front door | She opened the door to a policeman | He told her he had  a warrant for her arrest | She was shocked because she did not think she had done anything wrong | The policeman said she needed to just pay her parking tickets
Gunther boiled some eggs in a pot | The water in the pot boiled over the pot | Gunther turned down the heat | His mom called him a space cadet | He didn't reply to that insult
Jill got a new dog | It was a husky and she named it Wolf | He liked to run and play in the park | Jill gave him a special treat every day | Wolf became her best friend

Javier noticed that his running shorts were becoming worn out | He decided to look for a new pair to buy | He was surprised to see that new running shorts were so expensive | However, he decided to buy a pair, despite the price | Now Javier looks great in his new running shorts
Carla worked at the mall | For her lunch break she ate at the food court | One day she forgot her money | Her co-worker found out she couldn't eat | Carla's co-worker bought her lunch

Dawn is a beautiful woman who wants to model | She has agencies knocking at her door everyday | Her boyfriend will not allow her to become a model | Last week she gave him an ultimatum | Dawn signed her first modeling contact today
Alicia decided to participate in the fun run | She got a team of friends together | During the run, she got exhausted | It was a workout | Alicia got in third place
Kate's crush needed a ride home | They chatted as she drove | He got her phone number and got out of the car | Kate waited a week for a call from him | She never received a phone call
The batteries in Manny's clock had gone out | He didn't realize the batteries were dead | Manny had an appointment | He was going by the time on the clock | Manny was late for his appointment

I met my sister in law in 1981 | After we got married we asked her to go to dinner with us | She was very shy and said no, but changed her mind | We had dinner with her at Victoria Station, a steak house | It became her favorite restaurant

Rachel went to her bed friend's house for Thanksgiving | Her friend's mom and dad cooked a turkey and five side dishes | They all ate dinner | They ate pumpkin pie for dessert | They then socialized and laughed until Rachel went home
Phil wanted to be an actor | He started his own YouTube channel | His friends shared his clips | One made its way to a director at a theatre | He invited Phil to try out for the lead role!

Emily just got a used washer and dryer | They worked very well at first | Suddenly, the dryer would turn on but not start | Emily looked up reasons why it might not start | It turns out the dryer door wasn't completely shut, so it starts now

My son loves to play baseball | He has always wanted to play on the all star team | He practiced and played hard all season | In the end, his team voted for him to try out for allstars | He tried out, and made the team!

A new show came out recently that I wanted to see | It has very good reviews so I was very interested | I asked a few friends if they've seen it yet and they all said no | I decided to start watching the show in my free time | The show turned out to be very good and I recommended it to friends!

Three months ago my bosses hired someone | They decided to have me train him for his new job | I've been working with him every day since then | He still has no idea what he's doing | Meanwhile, I've been saddled with trying to do two jobs

Alex and reza had been dating for two years | They were planning to get married on their fifth year | But after a year, reza got pregnant | So they decided to get married earlier of what they've planned | Even its earlier, their wedding was still unforgettable and special
